_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeafMC
author: basti@basti202999.xyz
description: LeafMC is a high-performance Minecraft server software that aims to find balance between performance, vanilla and stability.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# LeafMC Installation Script

# Server Files Directory
cd /mnt/server

# Install dependencies
apt-get update
apt-get install -y curl jq wget imagemagick

# Set version
if [ -z "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" ] || [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    echo "Fetching latest LeafMC version..."
    MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(curl -s -A "Mozilla/5.0" https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/leaf | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
    [ -z "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" ] || [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" == "null" ] && MINECRAFT_VERSION="1.21.8"
fi
echo "Using version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"

# Set build
if [ -z "${BUILD_NUMBER}" ] || [ "${BUILD_NUMBER}" == "latest" ]; then
    echo "Fetching latest build..."
    BUILD_NUMBER=$(curl -s -A "Mozilla/5.0" https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/leaf/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
    [ -z "$BUILD_NUMBER" ] || [ "$BUILD_NUMBER" == "null" ] && BUILD_NUMBER="1"
fi
echo "Using build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"

# Download
JAR_NAME="leaf-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar"
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/leaf/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}"

[ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ] && mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old

echo "Downloading LeafMC jar from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -L -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} \
     -A "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; LeafMC-Pterodactyl-Installer/1.0)" \
     -H "Accept: application/octet-stream, application/java-archive, */*" \
     --connect-timeout 30 --max-time 300 --retry 3 \
     "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
     
# Validate download
FILE_SIZE=$(stat -c%s ${SERVER_JARFILE} 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
echo "Downloaded file size: ${FILE_SIZE} bytes"

if [ ${FILE_SIZE} -lt 1048576 ]; then
    echo "API download failed, trying GitHub releases..."
    for URL in \
        "https://github.com/LeafMC/Leaf/releases/download/v${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/leaf-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}.jar" \
        "https://github.com/LeafMC/Leaf/releases/download/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/leaf-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}.jar" \
        "https://github.com/LeafMC/Leaf/releases/latest/download/leaf.jar"
    do
        echo "Trying: $URL"
        curl -L -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} -A "Mozilla/5.0" "$URL"
        FILE_SIZE=$(stat -c%s ${SERVER_JARFILE} 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
        [ ${FILE_SIZE} -gt 1048576 ] && break
    done
fi

# Final validation
if [ ! -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ] || [ ${FILE_SIZE} -lt 1048576 ]; then
    echo "ERROR: Failed to download LeafMC jar"
    exit 1
fi
echo "Successfully downloaded LeafMC jar (${FILE_SIZE} bytes)"
mkdir config
curl -L -o "bukkit.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/bukkit.yml"
curl -L -o "spigot.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/spigot.yml"
curl -L -o "server.properties" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/server.properties"
echo "eula=true" > eula.txt
cd config
curl -L -o "gale-global.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/gale-global.yml"
curl -L -o "gale-world-defaults.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/gale-world-defaults.yml"
curl -L -o "leaf-global.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/leaf-global.yml"
curl -L -o "paper-global.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/paper-global.yml"
curl -L -o "paper-world-defaults.yml" -A "Mozilla/5.0" "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Basti20999/configs/refs/heads/main/paper-world-defaults.yml"

if [ "${GEYSER}" == 1 ]; then
    echo "Downloading latest Geyser Spigot plugin..."
    cd /mnt/server
    mkdir -p plugins

    GEYSER_URL="https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/spigot"
    
    curl -L -o /mnt/server/plugins/Geyser.jar -A "Mozilla/5.0" "$GEYSER_URL"

    FILE_SIZE=$(stat -c%s plugins/Geyser.jar 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
    if [ "$FILE_SIZE" -lt 100000 ]; then
        echo "Warning: Geyser plugin download failed or file too small."
    else
        echo "Geyser plugin successfully downloaded (${FILE_SIZE} bytes)."
    fi
    
    floodgate_URL="https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/spigot"
    
    curl -L -o /mnt/server/plugins/floodgate.jar -A "Mozilla/5.0" "$floodgate_URL"

    FILE_SIZE=$(stat -c%s plugins/floodgate.jar 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
    if [ "$FILE_SIZE" -lt 100000 ]; then
        echo "Warning: floodgate plugin download failed or file too small."
    else
        echo "floodgate plugin successfully downloaded (${FILE_SIZE} bytes)."
    fi

    mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins/Geyser-Spigot
    cat > /mnt/server/plugins/Geyser-Spigot/config.yml <<EOF
bedrock:
  port: ${GEYSER_PORT}
EOF
fi



echo ""
echo "=========================================="
echo "LeafMC Installation Complete!"
echo "Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
echo "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
echo "Jar file: ${SERVER_JARFILE} (${FILE_SIZE} bytes)"
echo "MOTD: Welcome to LeafMC!"
echo "Server is ready to start!"
echo "Accept the EULA before launching."
echo "=========================================="
echo ""

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of LeafMC to download. Leave at latest to always get the latest version.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description: The build number for the LeafMC release. Leave at latest to always get the latest build.
